page.title: 12Family Life in Monmouth 2.
page.content: Sally... On a{Sunday}we get up at 10.00 and we get ready to go to my nan and grandads for lunch at 12.00. When we've eaten our lunch we go back home and we watch a bit of T.V, while my mum does the ironing.Samantha and I have a bath at 06.30 and get ready for bed, watch more T.V. and to bed by 20.30. My mum goes to bed at 23.00. On a{weekday}we get up at 08.00, dress, have breakfast and leave for school at 08.45. My mum leaves for work at 08.50.After school my mum collects me, at home I practise my violin, have tea at 16.00 then go swimming, as I am a member of a swimming club, and arrive home at 20.00, have supper and off to bed at 20.45. My mum, who accompanies us to the baths, goes to bed at 22.30.
